text: Flatliners is a 2017 American Canadian science fiction horror movie directed by Niels Arden Oplev and is the remake of the 1990 movie of the same name. It stars Elliot Page, Diego Luna, Nina Dobrev, Kiersey Clemons, Kiefer Sutherland, Jenny Raven. ==Other websites== * * Category:2017 science fiction movies Category:2017 horror movies Category:American science fiction horror movies Category:Canadian science fiction movies Category:Canadian horror movies Category:Movies directed by Niels Arden Oplev
title: Flatliners (2017 movie)
